name: commerce-seed
description: Autonomous storefront composer — discovers business model, selects components, installs the purchase flow, and wires cart state + product types. Delivers a working e-commerce frontend.
postMessage:
Commerce Seed installed at .claude/skills/commerce-seed/SKILL.md

Describe your store — what you sell, who buys it, and how. The skill composes a complete storefront:

Browse: product-grid, product-detail, category-nav, search-filters
Buy: cart, checkout, order-history
Engage: wishlist

Not a list — a wired purchase flow with shared cart state and product types.
